doc.field: Alza Corp said it plans to make an offering in Europe of 75 mln dlrs principal amount of 15-year convertible subordinated debentures. The company said it expects the annual coupon rate of the bonds to be between 5-1/2 pct and 5-3/4 pct. It said the bonds will be convertible into Alza common stock at an expected premium of between 17 and 22 pct of the share price on the pricing date. Alza also said it expects the debentures will be listed on the Luxembourg Stock Exchange. Reuter
